classes.name: gstyle-sidebar-lastused
classes.selector: nav > div.flex-col.flex-1.transition-opacity.duration-500.overflow-y-auto > div > div > span > div > div > div

classes.name: gstyle-sidebar-buttons
classes.selector: nav > div.flex-col.flex-1.transition-opacity.duration-500.overflow-y-auto > div > div > span > div > ol > li > a

classes.name: gstyle-table-header
classes.selector: div.items-center table tr, table thead, table th

classes.name: gstyle-generic-text2
classes.selector: blockquote, dd, dl, fieldset, figure, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, hr, p, pre, button.text-gray-500

classes.name: gstyle-generic-markdown
classes.selector: .markdown ol li, .markdown ol li>p, .markdown ol ol, .markdown ol ul, .markdown ul li, .markdown ul li>p, .markdown ul ol, .markdown ul ul

classes.name: gstyle-generic-whitebg
classes.selector: .markdown ol li, .markdown ol li>p, .markdown ol ol, .markdown ol ul, .markdown ul li, .markdown ul li>p, .markdown ul ol, .markdown ul ul
